title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
**SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard**

Elevate your gaming experience to new heights with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, expertly designed to provide the perfect blend of tactile feedback and smooth actuation. Whether you're a hardcore gamer or a casual user, this keyboard is engineered to exceed your performance expectations with its innovative features and robust build.

**Key Features:**

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches:** Experience the satisfying tactile click of a blue mechanical switch combined with the softness of a smooth membrane for unparalleled typing comfort.
- **OLED Smart Display:** Personalize your gaming setup with a customizable OLED display that shows off your favorite gifs, in-game info, or Discord messages at a glance.
- **Universal Compatibility:** Whether you're on Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, or PlayStation, this keyboard connects seamlessly for a hassle-free gaming session.
- **Durable Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame:** The solid construction ensures long-term durability and stability, withstanding the intensity of your gaming marathons.
- **Dynamic Per-Key RGB Illumination:** Customize your setup with per-key RGB lighting, creating a vibrant and immersive gaming environment.
- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest:** Enjoy full palm support and comfort during extended gaming sessions, thanks to the detachable premium magnetic wrist rest.
- **Water Resistance:** Certified with IP32 water resistance, this keyboard is built to protect against accidental spills and keep you in the game.
- **Generous Dimensions:** Measuring 900mm in length, 300mm in width, and 4mm in height (35.43 x 11.81 x 0.16 inches), it provides ample space for comfortable typing and gaming.
- **USB Connectivity:** Simply plug it into your system with the required USB port and get ready to dominate your games.

**Ideal for Both Gaming and General Use:**
The Apex 5 is not just for gaming; its versatility makes it a stellar choice for everyday computing tasks. Whether you're writing a report or charging through enemy lines, this keyboard ensures a satisfying and efficient experience.

**In the Box:**
- SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
- Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest
- Quick Start Guide

Unleash the full potential of your gaming prowess with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, where durability meets innovation. Get yours today and step up your game!

**SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard**

Elevate your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, designed for both hardcore gamers and everyday users who seek precision, durability, and style.

**Key Features:**

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches**: Experience the tactile click of a blue mechanical switch combined with the smooth actuation of a membrane for a unique typing feel.
- **OLED Smart Display**: Stay informed and customize your gameplay with an integrated OLED display that shows game info, Discord messages, and even customizable gifs.
- **Universal Compatibility**: Seamlessly connect with a variety of operating systems including Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation.
- **Robust Build**: The frame is constructed from aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, offering a sleek look with unmatched strength.
- **Per-Key RGB Illumination**: Illuminate your setup with dynamic per-key RGB lighting, providing endless color schemes and effects for personalization.
- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest**: Attach the plush wrist rest magnetically for full palm support and comfort during extended gaming sessions.
- **IP32 Water Resistance**: Protect your investment from accidental spills with IP32-rated water resistance.
- **USB Connectivity**: A simple USB connection is all you need to power up this versatile keyboard.

**Dimensions:**

- Width: 900 mm (35.43 inches)
- Depth: 300 mm (11.81 inches)
- Height: 4 mm (0.16 inches)

Whether you're dominating the digital battlefield, completing your next creative project, or just typing away, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is the perfect tool to enhance your desk setup. With its thoughtful design and innovative features, you'll be ready for anything that comes your way.

**SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard**

Elevate your gaming setup with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, a state-of-the-art device designed to blend the tactile satisfaction of blue mechanical switches with the smoothness of a membrane. The keyboard's robust aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame ensures durability and a sleek, modern aesthetic. 

**Key Features:**

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches:** Experience the best of both worlds with the tactile click of blue mechanical switches combined with the smoothness of a membrane for quick and responsive keystrokes.
- **OLED Smart Display:** Customize your gaming experience with an integrated OLED smart display. Show off your personal style with customizable gifs, keep an eye on game info, or stay updated with Discord messages, all at a glance.
- **Per-Key RGB Illumination:** Dynamic per-key RGB lighting gives you unlimited customization options and the power to create the ultimate immersive gaming atmosphere.
- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest:** Enjoy full palm support and comfort during long gaming sessions thanks to the premium magnetic wrist rest designed for ergonomics and ease of use.
- **Durable and Water-Resistant:** The IP32 water resistance rating protects your keyboard from accidental spills and splashes, ensuring your gear stays safe in the heat of the moment.
- **Wide Compatibility:** Whether you're a PC gamer or console enthusiast, the Apex 5 is ready to go with compatibility across Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation platforms.
- **Convenient Dimensions:** The keyboard's dimensions are 900mm in length, 300mm in width, and 4mm in height (or 35.43 inches by 11.81 inches), fitting comfortably into most gaming setups.
- **Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Frame:** The solid build quality is not just for looks; it's designed to withstand the rigors of intense gaming sessions.

Whether you're deep into a competitive match or just typing away, the SteelSeries Apex 5 is designed to offer a premium gaming experience for both casual and serious gamers alike. It's more than just a keyboard; it's an investment in your gaming future. 

**System Requirements:**
- USB port required for connectivity

Take control of your gaming destiny. Unleash the full potential of every keystroke with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard.

**SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard**

Elevate your gaming experience to new heights with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, the perfect fusion of tactile mechanical precision and smooth membrane keys. Designed for gamers who demand both feel and performance, this keyboard offers the best of both worlds.

**Key Features:**

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches**: Experience the tactile click of blue mechanical switches combined with the soft cushioning of a membrane for quick and responsive keystrokes.
- **OLED Smart Display**: Customize your OLED display with your favorite gifs, view in-game information, or keep up with Discord messages, all without interrupting your gameplay.
- **Universal Compatibility**: Play seamlessly across multiple platforms with support for Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation.
- **Durable Frame**: The keyboard's frame is constructed from aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, ensuring both durability and a sleek, modern look.
- **Per-Key RGB Illumination**: Dynamic per-key RGB lighting allows for endless customization and flair—sync up with your games, music, or mood.
- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest**: Enjoy full palm support and comfort during extended gaming sessions with the detachable magnetic wrist rest.
- **Water Resistant**: An IP32 water resistance rating protects against spills, ensuring your keyboard's longevity.
- **Compact Design**: With dimensions of 900mm (35.43 inches) in length, 300mm (11.81 inches) in width, and a slim 4mm (0.16 inches) height, this keyboard is both spacious and low-profile.
- **USB Connectivity**: Simply plug in the USB port and you're ready to go—no additional software required.

Whether you're gaming competitively, streaming, or just enjoying some casual play, the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is versatile enough for all your computer needs. Get ready to enjoy a premium typing experience, tailored to your unique style and comfort.

**SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard - Tactile & Clicky**

Elevate your gaming experience to the next level with the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, designed to deliver the perfect blend of a mechanical switch's tactile response and a membrane's smoothness. Its cutting-edge hybrid mechanical switches provide the satisfying tactile click of a blue mechanical switch paired with the smooth, quiet action of a membrane.

**Features:**

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches:** Experience the tactile click of a blue switch combined with a smooth membrane for ultimate gaming performance.
- **OLED Smart Display:** Customize the OLED display with your favorite gifs, view in-game information, or keep up with Discord messages directly on your keyboard.
- **Per-Key RGB Illumination:** Dynamic per-key RGB lighting gives you nearly unlimited color customization and control for individual keys.
- **Durable Frame:** Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, the keyboard's frame is built for a lifetime of consistent, unyielding durability.
- **Compatible With Multiple OS:** Whether you're a PC gamer or console player, the Apex 5 is compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation.
- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest:** The keyboard includes a magnetic wrist rest providing full palm support and comfort for extended gaming sessions.
- **Water Resistance:** With an IP32 water resistance rating, minor spills and accidents won't phase your gaming.
- **USB Connectivity:** Simply plug in the keyboard via USB and you're ready to go, no additional software required.

**Specifications:**

- **Dimensions:** 900mm (L) x 300mm (W) x 4mm (H) / 35.43 inches (L) x 11.81 inches (W)
- **Frame Material:** Aircraft-grade aluminum alloy for maximum rigidity and durability.
- **Illumination:** Customizable per-key RGB lighting to set the perfect mood for every game.
- **Wrist Rest:** Premium magnetic design with exceptional comfort.

Whether you're battling it out in the latest FPS or working through spreadsheets, the SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is the versatile tool you need for both gaming and general use. Enjoy a premium typing experience and advanced features packed into one sleek, durable package. Get ready to dominate your games with precision and style!
